Text: Re Lets Go Sailing Cc Im game for a trip Any chance we could do it a week or a few days earlier and take advantage of the Thanksgiving holiday since we are already off Original Message From To Sent Thursday August PM Subject Lets Go Sailing What do you think This vacation estimate was created by The Moorings for Mark and crew If you would like more information please visit our web site at Thank you for considering The Moorings for your next sailing vacation Estimate Request No Set Sail Date Duration Days Departure Base St Martin Item Description Price Moorings Exclusive For Days USD Evening Start USD Provisioning ProvEasy On The Cook USD Security Insurance USD Total Charter Price USD Price Per Person Per Day USD Bareboat charters may choose to start at either noon or pm Crewed Yacht charters start at noon All charters end at noon You may start your charter any day of the week A minimum number of charter days may apply All prices are subject to change without notice Taxes vary by destination and may not be included in this estimate Please ask a Moorings Vacation Planning Specialist for details This estimate is provided for your convenience and to aid in planning your sailing vacation with The Moorings Availability and prices are subject to change and are not guaranteed until a deposit is made Your charter may qualify for a special offer or discount Please visit the Special Offers section of our web site or use the Contact Us page found on our Service Desk to contact a Vacation Planning Specialist for details

Re Lets Go SailingJim andor the Johns would be fine by us Original Message From To Cc Sent Friday August AM Subject RE Lets Go Sailing Good catch I was thinking that Thanksgiving was the th oops Ill get a revised quote Any ideas for who wants to go This particular boat has three cabins and heads If we have another person Jim or couple the Johns we would get along with for a week it would be fun and less expensive And if there are even more we could get a larger boat with four cabins We just need to know sooner rather than later to get the boat reserved Original Message From ENRON Re Lets Go SailingI will look for the Johns I do not know what to do about Jamie He has been in a funk and it is because of his family thing I do not know if we can commit to a trip but will work on it I want to go He needs to go Original Message From To Sent Monday August PM Subject RE Lets Go Sailing Here are the quotes from the Moorings One is for a which is about the size of boat we had last time but with cabins and heads last time was cabins heads which would be better for a smaller group but theyre already booked The other is for a a boat with four main cabins each with its own head and a fifth smaller cabin in the forepeak If we have need for the fourth cabin Id be inclined to go with the larger boat I talked to Jim on Friday and hes thinking about it wanted to check his calendar etc Any idea how to get in touch with the Johns Other potential sailors to suggest Luck curtailing Jamies guilt trip See attached file Moorings Quote rtfSee attached file Moorings Quote rtf Original
